msbt.message: Hey there, kiddo! You see all this confetti flyin' about? It's been doing that since this morning.Festivale is almost literally in the air, and it's casting quite an excitin' spell, !
Seen any of them colorful feathers floatin' in with the confetti?If you're swift, you might could catch one with your net. And if you're not swift, wellI can relate. Gahaha!

Seeing all them feathers float by gave me an urge to try collectin' the whole set, .So far, things are goin' swellexcept that I can't seem to get myself .What I'm sayin' isif you get one you can part with, spare a thought for your old pal .
Well now! I don't imagine there's a more perfect Festivale outfit to be seen on all of .Just looking at you's got me all spun up and ready for some dancin'!
I'm lovin' that look, kiddo. You've got Festivale fashion down pat! And here I was hoping I'd be the best dressed.
Just how does Pavé do it? He's there out-dancin' all of us put together, and he hasn't even broken a sweat!Meanwhile, I was out of breath just walkin' here from my stoop.
Been quite a spell since I cut a rug like this! Reckon I'm gonna be plenty sore tomorrow, .
Stay alert for any rainbow feathers, kiddo. They're a rare find if you can claim one, !I mean, they're still just feathers, but there's a pizzazz to 'em that's downright irresistible!
This whole island's gone nutty with the Festivale spirit.Nothin' to do now except smile and enjoy the ride, .
You look surprised to see me out here. Well, don't be! I can boogie with the best of 'em, !
Glad to see you're up and about, kiddo. Nobody should be sleepin' in on Festivale, !
Hope you're not thinkin' this is Festivale at its peak. We're just getting warmed up, !
Despite the fun I'm havin', there's a part of me that's ready for Festivale to be done with My legs! Gahaha!
I swear I can still hear the Festivale music even in here No? Just me?Guess I got Festivale fever worse than I thought, !
Hmm I believe I feel a dance comin' on. Reckon its near time I hightailed it back outdoors, !
If you wanna do Festivale right, you gotta feel it deep down in your bones, .Then let those bones move around some so they can tell folks how they feel, and voilà! You're dancin'!
Taking a break? I get it. All that dancin' can really take it out of you. Stay as long as you like, kiddo.
I thought I'd be able to escape the noise and Festivale fervor in here, butnope, these legs wanna dance!
You can practically hear the Festivale energy just washin' over the island. Gonna be a fun day, !
Wow! You've got the Festivale spirit comin' off you in waves, kiddo!One look at you, and I'd wager even the grumpiest would start dancin' Yep! There it is!
Can you believe there's still folks out there dancin'? Look how late it is! Some of us gotta sleep
Call it a hunch, but you've got , right?I don't mean to pry. I've been after one for myself, is all. Wanna trade for my ?
Sure!
Sorry, no.
Don't ask me how I know about this, butwhat are you gonna do with your ?I mainly ask 'cause I was hoping I could trade with you. How about for my ?
Sure!
Sorry, no.
You just made my Festivale, kiddo!
Really? I didn't think that'd work
I can't thank you enough, but I'm gonna try Thanks, thanks, and thanks again, !
Thanks for hearin' me out. I owe you one, .
That's a no, huh? Well, you can't blame for tryin'.
Oh! That's a shame Well, fair's fair. Reckon I'll just ask around, then
Now we're talkin'! So that'll be of your for of my .
That's right!
Never mind.
